Effect Description: With unmatched agility, the Assassin slips away into the shadows. / Become hidden {value1} faster. / Your sneaking ability improves by {value2}. / Noise is completely nullified. / Sneak damage bonus is increased by {value3}.

The ergonomic fit of an Athlete's gear helps them maintain peak performance without spending extra energy. / Running speed increased by {value1}. / Stamina regenerates {value2} faster while running. / Max stamina is increased by {value3}.

A Biker's full road gear is not only intimidating, but provides additional physical protection. / Minibikes and motorcycles use {value1} less fuel. / Increase your critical injury resistance by {value2}. / Gain {value3} extra max hp.

A Commando's specialized training, physical resilience, and swift recovery ensure they never stay down for long. / Machine gun damage and reload speed are improved by {value1}. / Max stamina is increased by {value2}.
Feeling lucky in a well tailored suit gives the Enforcer a slight edge in a gun fight. / Increases firerate, range, accuracy, damage and reload speed of .44 guns by {value1}.

Knowing where it comes from, Farmers recover faster from food. / Gain {value1} more health and stamina from food. / Get a {value2} chance to get an extra seed from harvest. / Gain {value3} chance to harvest an additional crop.

With the proper gear, a Lumberjack can go all day. / While using axes and chainsaws: / Increase wood harvest by {value1}. / Use {value2} less stamina. / Increase base entity damage by {value3}. / Increase block damage by {value4}.

Miners possess the expertise to extract resources efficiently while preserving their tools from excessive wear and tear. / While using mining tools: / Increase harvest and block damage by {value1}. / Decreases stamina usage by {value2}. / Increase base entity damage by {value3}.

Understanding the mechanics of turrets and weapons allows the Nerd to operate them properly. / Gain {value1} more experience. / Improves junk turrents by {value2}. / You can deploy {value3} additional junk turret.

Trekking through the wasteland, a Nomad's armor serves as their oasis. / Use {value1} less food and water when recovering stamina. / Increase stamina regeneration by {value2}. / Increase max hp by {value3}.

A Saint's comfort and security. / Reduces the chance of critical injuries and infections by {value1}. / Critical Injuries heal {value2} faster. / Your passive healing is increased by 1 every {value3} seconds.

Raiders wear protective armor giving them a natural resistance to damage, reducing the effectiveness of attacks against them. / Reduces the chance of critical injuries by {value1}. / Increase max hp and stamina by {value2}.

The Ranger's improved archery ability is a result of intensive training, honed muscle memory, and tactical finesse. / Damage, range, reload speed, projectile velocity and accuracy are all increased by {value1} for bows and crossbows.

Rogues have a natural instinct for locating loot that others might overlook. / Find {value1} more dukes and cash in loot. / Sneaking is {value2} better. / Decreases lockpicking time by {value3} and break chance by {value4}.
Scavengers have a keen eye at uncovering valuable treasures that might elude others. / Find {value1} better quality loot. / Carry capacity increased by {value2}. / Salvage {value3} more resources.
